alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:58AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Shower with gusty winds impact portions of Metrowest through 745 AM EDT... At 656 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking several showers with the potential for localized strong winds and perhaps a brief funnel cloud. One shower was located near Framingham, and the other was northeast of Sudbury. Movement was to the north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Framingham, Waltham, Billerica, Marlborough, Chelmsford, Andover, Natick, Lexington, Tewksbury, Wellesley, Burlington, Wilmington, Westford, Acton, Hudson, Concord, Sudbury, Ashland, and Bedford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Western Essex
